name: Continue Loop
description: Skip to the next iteration of the loop

fields.label: Conditional Continue
fields.helperText: Only continue if condition is true

fields.label: Condition
fields.helperText: Continue only if this condition is true

generators.bash: (config) => { if (config.conditional && config.condition) { return `if ${config.condition}; then continue; fi`; } return `continue`; }
